directions.step:
Date: Thu, 21 Mar 96 09:30:51 PST
From: eboyd@shentel.net
Peel shrimp and cut chicken into 1 inch cubes. Combine Garlic, Onion powder, Cumin and melted Butter. Marinate shrimp and chicken while reparing grill. String shrimp and chicken onto separate skewers. Cook about 5 inches above hot coals, allowing 5 minutes for shrimp and 10 minutes for chicken. Turn once or twice while cooking and baste often with remaining marinade.
